SELEZIONE STORE WEB | 2018 Client: Selezione This particular project was built on the demand of the client about a simple internet store. So, it was decided to choose free WordPress template with WooCommerce. That template was restyled and recieve different modifications due to client's vision of the final product. You can find this website here: wordpress-new-com.stackstaging.com
